Reviews.Title: “Horrible service”
Reviews.Author: qwerty181
Reviews.Content: Front desk service was totally rude and very unhelpful. Never coming back again, would not recommend this hotel to no one.

Reviews.Title: “TERRIBLE EXPERIENCE”
Reviews.Author: RACHEL R
Reviews.Content: It was very difficult to find the hotel. We drove around for 1 1/2 hours and called the hotel 8 times. The hotel's staff could not provide the proper directions. The staff was very inefficient. This hotel was very disappointing. We rented 2 rooms and did not have any hot water. We also found roaches in the restrooms. The room safes did not work in both rooms. The hotel did not have a map to the airport either. This was our worse hotel experience ever.

Reviews.Title: “Impressive service, great location”
Reviews.Author: zimrin
Reviews.Content: Came to Bayamon for work.Was here four nights. Staff were very sweet and helpful in both English and Spanish. Located close to two malls, tons of restaurants and easy highway access. Breakfast was basic -just cereal, toast and muffins but the coffee was excellent. My room only had tall skinny windows and the only outside seating was in the restaurant which was a little dissapointing. I was here for work but I would have liked a little time loafing in the sun Parking was very easy and secure. Room was clean and comfortable.Wi Fi was a bit spotty but that was true for my phone, too. Overall-just what I needed but with the bonus of truly sweet and helpful staff. I will stay here again when business brings me back.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent”
Reviews.Author: travel_agent_Queb
Reviews.Content: This hotel, in the City Center, next to Santa Rosa Mall is great. It's small, comfy and like home. It has only a few rooms, but WOW. I only stayed for one night, but I found it better than what I thought it would be. Very Clean, very friendly staff. And the mall is at walking distance. I give it a 10!

Reviews.Title: “A diamond in the rough”
Reviews.Author: Bargain4us631
Reviews.Content: I was on a personal business matter and needed to stay local without the hassels of traveling back and forth. Talk about a hotel smack in the middle of a centrally located area, that's what I was looking for and found it. Let me tell you that to my surprise the hotel was impressive, from the friendly staff the minute you walked in to the cleanliness throughout the entire establishment, it just smelled clean. You can tell the place was humming, management was on top of their game. I found that they had a restaurant on the main floor called the Tierra Adentro, I tell you the food was to die for. This was right up there, top quisine stuff. I looked no more I found a home. I would highly recommend it to anyone who is looking for a place to stay near by and doesn't like to travel back and forth to San Juan. Sincerely, Roberto Colon

Reviews.Title: “Robbery in parking of hotel”
Reviews.Author: Cynthia1953
Reviews.Content: Merchandise was stolen from the trunk of my rental car. The managment had me write a report without notifing the police. 24 hrs passed and I no longer could make a report because the office failed to bring the police to my door while I was in the shower, even after I told Sierra -- ( mgr) that I would be in shower. Was treated like a had made up the story. I had to complete my stay of 4 nights at the hotel while I felt unsafe walking to my rental car & as it was the only hotel close to my dying father. The Management did not make me feel safe after the incident. I payed in full my complete stay without them making a gesture of good will waving at least, a night's stay or any courtesy in any other area.

Reviews.Title: “If you are on a business trip, this is the place!”
Reviews.Author: restomor06
Reviews.Content: Excellent service, friendly staff, high security with indoor free parking. If you are not looking for luxury, pool, casino and nightlife, this is the place to stay. It is very close to the malls. The place is super clean, free internet access, free continental breakfast, it even has a gym. Restaurant is opens on Thursday's.

Reviews.Title: “Caribbean Martial Arts Seminar”
Reviews.Author: aikido2
Reviews.Content: We were on a Martial Arts Training Seminar with our spouses. This was a nice hotel considering it was the only one in the Bayamon area, and I have to admit...this was definitely a little different than what I am accustomed to in a hotel, but the longer I stayed, the more I was able to adjust.The room was a good size and clean. The bathroom was clean and modern. The view...10 thumbs down! That's all I need to say about that. There was no pool, and the beach was not close by so had it been extremely hot, it would have made for a difficult trip, but the weather was kinda overcast-ish the entire time, so I guess it kind of worked out. The air conditioning....brrrrrrrrrr..was great....very cold or should I say comfortable. Had it been in the midst of the summer when it gets very hot in Puerto Rico, the appreciation for this hotel would have been a plus...lol. The rooms could use some updating though, including the TV and carpet. A microwave and fridge would also be a welcomed plus especially for a diabetic. Certain medications have to be refrigerated at all times. This was he first time I've ever stayed at a hotel that did not have a fridge or microwave in the room. Definitely a challenge. The entire staff was awesome though, so this made up for everything else that was lacking! Luci, the front desk attendant was extremely patient and had one of the most pleasant personalities you'd ever want to encounter. She always had a smile on her face and was most helpful. Maria, who was also a front desk attendant was a very pleasant person. I needed to print out our boarding passes for our trip home on the following day, and she went above and beyond the call of courtesy toget the passes printed for me as well as making our check out process go very smoothly. We had a driver by the name of Carlos who was "off the chain". He was our guide to all of the tourist spots and let me tell you, this young man can drive! He was awesome and extremely nice (:). The hotel restaurant was not that impressive, but our waiter, can't remember his name, but I think he is also the owner, was one of the sweetest people I met while there. Very attentive and accommodating. However, on the last day, I finally tried the beans, rice and some chicken wings, and was pleasantly surpirsed. The food was very good, so I guess we were just choosing the wrong eats. Also, if you stay at this hotel, you have gotta try their guava butter spread for the freshly baked rolls. It is soooo good. I pretty much got full off the bread and spread alone. Oh yeah...one last thing....you gotta get the Sangria. The bartender at the hotel makes some of the best I've ever tasted. Still wasn't enough alcohol in it, but it was refreshing (:). All in all, I will definitely stay at this hotel again. We are planning another trip to Puerto Rico, but this time want to stay in San Juan on the beautiful beach(s).

Reviews.Title: “Very nice place”
Reviews.Author: AttractionUSA
Reviews.Content: We stayed there for a couple of nights. It was our first visit to San Jose and were going on to Rincon. The hotel staff was very helpful, the rooms were very clean. It's about 10 minutes by car from Old San Juan and it wasn't a problem to commute. We saved about $90 per night versus staying in the tourist area of San Juan. There isn't much night life around there, but we knew that ahead of time. We would definitely use this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “Care Free”
Reviews.Author: retiredchic
Reviews.Content: The hotel staff was friendley and helpful. The hotel was clean and neat. We stayed 5 days and 6 nights. We rented a car and were gone all day visiting family and shopping. When we returned to the hotel at night, the parking was convinient and safe, underground, with plenty of parking spaces. We ate dinner with our extended family at the Hotel Restaurant. The food was tipical puertorican cuisine, fresh, delicious and reasonable priced. Thank you Luis Otero for accomodating our large group at the restaurant and for your excellent service. We recommend this hotel to all travelers, business and families.

Reviews.Title: “Wonderful Atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: Zoraida724
Reviews.Content: I would recommend the San Miguel Plaza Hotel to anyone who is visiting Puerto Rico and need to stay in the Bayamon area. It's the perfect quiet hotel with an excellent restaurant right in the hotel so you don't need to go any where for the best food and people, as well as music. I returned to Puerto Rico after 20 years to see my father and I was a little concerned with booking a hotel in that area, but San Miguel Plaza Hotel makes you feel very comfortable and it's very clean and the staff are so wonderful you will not want to leave. They gave us special treatment and are so helpful with giving you directions to any where in San Juan. I plan to return soon.

Reviews.Title: “Very Nice excellent staff and security”
Reviews.Author: LaDuquesa
Reviews.Content: None of my family knew there was a hotel in Bayamon so I was kinda scared of staying there. I dont regret it. The hotel is brand new so imagine it was real clean, parking is free in an underground completely secured garage, you have to speak to someone to get in so no worries of being harrassed by anyone. The location isnt that great but theres a great mall right across the street that I spent most of my time in and theres small spots to eat all over the place, the staff was very professional and every place in the hotel is 100% secured you have to use a key to get into a floor. I will def stay here again . The room wasnt that spacious but a double will suit at least 4 adults just fine . wifi in the room was a plus

Reviews.Title: “Good Value”
Reviews.Author: bert55Miami
Reviews.Content: Excellent value, especially if you get the "corporate rate". Parking and Internet is included. Parking is ample, secure and covered (basement). This is a luxury in San Juan (Bayamon is about 20 minutes away) and Isla verde, where hotels have crowded casinos and parking is a mess! The hotel is centrally located, especially if you will be working or exploring the northwest ( Camuy caves , Arecibo Observatory and beaches) . It is also about 4 blocks from the Elevated metro and 3 blocks from a large mall. Restaurant food is excellent but pricey and small portions- haute cuisine--., and restaurant service is friendly but not always efficient . Same goes for room service. There are quite a few restaurant choices nearby , including a 24 hour option, Mi pollito which is excellent ( local food - caution cash only-about 4 blocks away, on Road #2 just west of Santa Rosa Mall) . Very nice jogging trail only one block away. Ask at the front desk, it's hard to figure out how to get in.

Reviews.Title: “The best”
Reviews.Author: milton23
Reviews.Content: Me and my girlfriend decide to go to puerto rico for a long weekend. When we got there, personel at the reservation was very friendly, we went to the restaurant inside the hotel wish was great too. the rooms were nice everything clean and the best part was that i was located few mins away from major roads , only took us 20 mins to drive to old san juan

Reviews.Title: “good location”
Reviews.Author: shootingstar7
Reviews.Content: I stayed in this hotel the night of my honeymoon and I the hotel is extremely clean, maybe because the hotel is new, but you don't have to worry about roaches or anything like that. Also I found that it was peaceful, I couldn't hear the noise from other rooms. What I didin't like was the free continental breakfast, the room was very small and only 3 tables for all the guests, also there wasn't a lot of breakfast options.

Reviews.Title: “Very Friendly and Helpful”
Reviews.Author: lululaura
Reviews.Content: Everything was very nice, new, and clean. The continental breakfast was fresh. The front desk staff was very helpful, offering tips and directions and they spoke very good english. The neighborhood that the hotel is in is very safe and secure, the hotel has underground parking. Conveniently located near expressways.

Reviews.Title: “Loved it!”
Reviews.Author: CountryVisitorLulu
Reviews.Content: We had to go to a wedding and needed a hotel to stay at! Great choice. While it was just one night it met all our needs. The Front Dest Attendant was very helpful and friendly. The rooms were very comfortable and clean. The environment was cozy and very pleasant. We enjoyed our stay and will definitely stay again when necessary. There was no swimming pool but I didnÂ´t need to have it for my stay. There was a gym and I hope to use it next time. The hotel is located in the Baymon business area and easy to travel to other locations. It is near to hospital areas as well. It was easy to go to the different shopping malls and the Metrpolitan area. It is a great hotel for Executives on Seminars as well. My family and I enjoyed our stay.

Reviews.Title: “Good Value for Business”
Reviews.Author: IvoryMiami
Reviews.Content: We had a small meeting at the San Miguel which is convenient to our office. You won't find all the amenities of a larger hotel or resort but for business use the staff is accomodating, the rooms are nice and overall it was an excellent value.

Reviews.Title: “Excellent Choice”
Reviews.Author: Snapooh
Reviews.Content: It is excellent located near the "Tren Urbano" , It has excellent and so kind personnel. The bedroom was so nice and beautifully furnished, so was the bathroom. Excellent is the word, I would stay there again, definitely!

Reviews.Title: “We Loved”
Reviews.Author: Fiolbeli
Reviews.Content: The Services was exelent and very frently, the rooms was perfectly clean, the price was good for the season, we strongly recoment it...San Miguel Plaza Hotel & Restaurant [--] in Bayamon, Puerto Rico..[--]

HotelInfo.Name: San Miguel Plaza Hotel
HotelInfo.Address: 2 Calle Las Rosas Apt 101 | San Miguel Plaza, Bayamon 00961, Puerto Rico
